immediate_actions.action: Pre-install Maven on Devin's machine environment to enable Java project build verification and testing commands. This is essential for Java/Spring Boot project analysis tasks where build status and test execution are relevant to the assessment.

migration_fixes.issue_description: Devin attempted to use Maven (`mvn test-compile`) but it wasn't available in the environment, causing a failed command. Devin should have checked tool availability first or the environment should have been pre-configured with Maven for Java project analysis.
migration_fixes.recommended_fix: Address Environment issue: Devin attempted to use Maven (`mvn test-compile`) but it wasn't available in the environment, causing a failed command. Devin should have checked tool availability first or the environment should have been pre-configured with Maven for Java project analysis.

migration_fixes.issue_description: Devin used prohibited shell commands (grep/find) for searching and had to retry with proper built-in search commands. This created minor inefficiency but was quickly corrected.
migration_fixes.recommended_fix: Address Workflow issue: Devin used prohibited shell commands (grep/find) for searching and had to retry with proper built-in search commands. This created minor inefficiency but was quickly corrected.

improvements.description: Patterns to avoid based on failed attempts

patterns.description: Attempted `mvn test-compile` to check build status but Maven not available in environment
Examined multiple complex COBOL programs to understand business logic and migration complexity
User set block_on_user_response="DONE" indicating satisfaction with the comprehensive deliverable

next_session_approach.improved_prompt:
!ask Carefully analyze the status of migration by comparing the source @taylor-curran/og-cics-cobol-app repo to the target repo @taylor-curran/target-springboot-cics 

Determine the most advantageous next steps to take to make solid progress on the migration.

You only need to look in the following repos: taylor-curran/og-cics-cobol-app, taylor-curran/target-springboot-cics

make a list of the 5 next things that should be done each with a detailed definition of done

Note: You may not need any repos for this task. Don't try to run Maven commands since Maven isn't available in the environment - focus on code analysis using your built-in search and file viewing tools.

feedback_reasons.summary: Add guidance to avoid Maven commands due to environment limitations
feedback_reasons.excerpt: Don't try to run Maven commands since Maven isn't available in the environment - focus on code analysis using your built-in search and file viewing tools.
feedback_reasons.details: Prevents failed command attempts and directs focus to available analysis tools.

issues.issue: Devin attempted to use Maven (`mvn test-compile`) but it wasn't available in the environment, causing a failed command. Devin should have checked tool availability first or the environment should have been pre-configured with Maven for Java project analysis.

issues.issue: Devin used prohibited shell commands (grep/find) for searching and had to retry with proper built-in search commands. This created minor inefficiency but was quickly corrected.

timeline.title: User requests migration analysis
timeline.description: User asks for detailed assessment of COBOL-to-Java migration status comparing two repositories with 5 prioritized next steps

timeline.title: Devin clones repos and inventories assets
timeline.description: Successfully cloned both repositories, identified 29 COBOL programs and existing Java infrastructure components

timeline.title: Systematic documentation review
timeline.description: Reviewed migration playbook, README files, and pom.xml to understand architecture, patterns, and coverage requirements

timeline.title: Maven command fails
timeline.description: Attempted `mvn test-compile` to check build status but Maven not available in environment

timeline.title: Prohibited shell commands used
timeline.description: Used shell find/grep commands which are not allowed, had to retry with proper built-in search commands

timeline.title: COBOL program analysis completed
timeline.description: Examined multiple complex COBOL programs to understand business logic and migration complexity

timeline.title: Comprehensive assessment delivered
timeline.description: Delivered detailed migration status report with current progress (4/29 programs), infrastructure analysis, and 5 prioritized steps with clear definitions of done

timeline.title: User marks task complete
timeline.description: User set block_on_user_response="DONE" indicating satisfaction with the comprehensive deliverable
